get.description:

Database health check.

Internal database health check endpoint.

Runs test queries to verify database schema matches models.
Returns HTML for browser viewing.

Internal database health check endpoint (JSON format).

Returns JSON for programmatic access.

Display seed data information (admin only).

Shows tenant IDs and test user credentials (except passwords).

post.description:
Authenticate user and return JWT access token.

Requires X-Tenant-ID header to identify the tenant.

Only admin users can create new users.
The new user must belong to the same tenant as the admin.

List all users in the current tenant.

Only admin users can list all users.

Only admin users can update other users.

get.description:
Search for candidates in your database with full-text search and structured filters.

**Full-text search (q parameter):**
- Searches across: first_name, last_name, current_title, current_company, bio, tags, cv_text
- Uses PostgreSQL full-text search with relevance ranking
- Results are ranked by: relevance score, promotability_score, updated_at

**Structured filters (all optional):**
- home_country, location, current_title, current_company: Partial match (case-insensitive)
- languages: Partial match for language names
- promotability_min/max: Filter by promotability score range
- assignment_role_id: Only return candidates assigned to this role
- assignment_status: Filter by assignment status (requires assignment_role_id)

**Default ordering (when no text search):**
- promotability_score DESC (nulls last)
- updated_at DESC

**Pagination:**
- Default limit: 50
- Max limit: 200
- Use offset for pagination

parameters.name: q

schema.description: Free-text search query (searches name, title, company, bio, tags, CV)
schema.title: Q

parameters.description: Free-text search query (searches name, title, company, bio, tags, CV)

parameters.name: assignment_role_id

schema.description: Filter by candidates assigned to this role (UUID)
schema.title: Assignment Role Id

parameters.description: Filter by candidates assigned to this role (UUID)

parameters.name: offset

schema.description: Number of results to skip (for pagination)
schema.title: Offset

parameters.description: Number of results to skip (for pagination)

get.description: List research runs for the tenant.

schema.title: Response List Research Runs Company Research Runs Get

post.description:
Create a new company research run for a specific role/mandate.

This initializes a discovery exercise with optional ranking and enrichment config.

get.description: Get a research run by ID with prospect count summary.

patch.description: Update a research run (status, description, config, etc.).

get.description: Get or build the deterministic plan for a research run.
List deterministic steps for a research run.

schema.title: Response List Research Run Steps Company Research Runs  Run Id  Steps Get

post.description: Enqueue a research run for processing.

get.description: List source documents attached to a run.

schema.title: Response List Run Sources Company Research Runs  Run Id  Sources Get

post.description: Attach a manual list source document to a run.
Attach a URL source document to a run for fetching.
Attach a PDF source document to a run for extraction.
Attach an AI proposal JSON payload as a source document for ingestion.
Retry a research run by enqueuing a new job (idempotent).
Request cancellation for a research run job.

get.description: List recent events for a research run.

schema.title: Response List Research Events Company Research Runs  Run Id  Events Get

get.description:
List company prospects for a research run.

Supports filtering by status, minimum relevance score, and ordering by AI or manual ranking.

Ordering modes:
- "ai": Pinned first, then by AI relevance_score DESC
- "manual": Pinned first, then by manual_priority ASC (1=highest) NULLS LAST, then relevance

parameters.name: status

schema.description: Filter by status (new, approved, rejected, duplicate, converted)
schema.title: Status

parameters.description: Filter by status (new, approved, rejected, duplicate, converted)

schema.title: Response List Prospects For Run Company Research Runs  Run Id  Prospects Get

get.summary: List Prospects For Run With Evidence
get.description:
List company prospects for a research run with evidence and source document details.

Returns prospects with nested evidence records and their linked source documents.
Uses efficient joins to avoid N+1 queries.

Ordering modes:
- "ai": Pinned first, then by AI relevance_score DESC
- "manual": Pinned first, then by manual_priority ASC (1=highest) NULLS LAST, then relevance

parameters.name: status

schema.description: Filter by status (new, approved, rejected, duplicate, converted)
schema.title: Status

parameters.description: Filter by status (new, approved, rejected, duplicate, converted)

schema.title: Response List Prospects For Run With Evidence Company Research Runs  Run Id  Prospects With Evidence Get

post.description: Create a new company prospect (typically called by AI/system).

get.description: Get a company prospect by ID.

patch.description:
Update manual override fields for a company prospect.

This endpoint ONLY updates:
- manual_priority (1 = highest priority)
- manual_notes
- is_pinned
- status

AI-calculated fields (relevance_score, evidence_score) are NEVER touched by this endpoint.

post.description:
Add evidence to a company prospect.

Evidence sources: ranking_list, association_directory, regulatory_register, etc.

get.description: List all evidence records for a specific company prospect.

schema.title: Response List Evidence For Prospect Company Research Prospects  Prospect Id  Evidence Get

post.description:
Add a metric to a company prospect.

Metrics: total_assets, revenue, employees, etc. with currency conversion to USD.

get.description:
List all metrics for a specific company prospect.

Optionally filter by metric_type.

parameters.name: metric_type

schema.description: Filter by metric type (total_assets, revenue, employees, etc.)
schema.title: Metric Type

parameters.description: Filter by metric type (total_assets, revenue, employees, etc.)

schema.title: Response List Metrics For Prospect Company Research Prospects  Prospect Id  Metrics Get

post.description:
[DEV ONLY] Create 5 dummy company prospects for testing.

This endpoint creates realistic fake data to test listing and sorting logic.
Remove or protect this endpoint in production.

schema.title: Response Seed Dummy Prospects Company Research Runs  Run Id  Seed Dummy Prospects Post
Response List Steps Api Runs  Run Id  Steps Get

post.description:
Upload a research bundle for a run.

Args:
    run_id: The research run ID
    payload: The bundle data
    accept_only: If True, only accept the bundle for review (don't start ingestion)
    current_user: Authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    BundleAcceptedResponse with status and processing information

get.description:
Download the stored bundle JSON for a research run.

Args:
    run_id: The research run ID
    current_user: Authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Dict containing the bundle JSON data

schema.title: Response Download Bundle Api Runs  Run Id  Bundle Get

post.description:
Approve a bundle that's in needs_review status for background ingestion.

Args:
    run_id: The research run ID
    current_user: Authenticated user
    db: Database session
    
Returns:
    Dict with job_id and status information

schema.title: Response Approve Bundle For Ingestion Api Runs  Run Id  Approve Post

post.description: Update manual fields for a prospect (called from inline editing).
[DEV ONLY] Create 5 dummy prospects for testing.
Add a URL source to a research run.
Add a text source to a research run.
Process all pending sources for a research run.

Phase 1: Manual List Ingestion
Parse two newline-separated lists of company names.
Normalize, deduplicate, and create CompanyProspect records with evidence tracking.

Phase 2: Validate AI Proposal JSON
Returns validation errors without making changes.

Phase 2: Ingest AI Proposal JSON
Parses and stores companies, metrics, aliases, and evidence.

get.description: System diagnostics page - shows health checks for Company Research module.
Root endpoint - redirects to login or dashboard.
